steps.title: Invoice Receipt & Capture
steps.description: Convert paper and digital invoices into structured data

aiOpportunity.description: AI-powered OCR and data extraction can automate 90%+ of manual data entry, reducing errors and processing time from hours to seconds.

painPoints: Manual data entry from paper invoices
Poor OCR accuracy with traditional tools

beforeAfter.before: Staff manually key invoice data from PDFs, emails, and paper — averaging 4-6 minutes per invoice with 8-12% error rates. Invoices pile up in shared inboxes.
beforeAfter.after: AI captures invoices from any channel in seconds with 95%+ accuracy. Data is auto-extracted, validated, and ready for matching before a human touches it.

steps.title: Data Validation & Enrichment
steps.description: Verify invoice data accuracy and completeness

aiOpportunity.description: AI can cross-reference POs, contracts, and historical data to automatically validate invoices and flag anomalies with 95%+ accuracy.

beforeAfter.before: AP clerks toggle between ERP, email, and spreadsheets to verify vendor info, tax IDs, and line-item details — often missing errors that surface downstream.
beforeAfter.after: AI auto-enriches records by cross-referencing master data, flags missing fields instantly, and suggests corrections based on historical patterns.

steps.title: 3-Way PO Matching
steps.description: Match invoices to purchase orders and receipts

aiOpportunity.description: AI can perform fuzzy matching across POs, receipts, and invoices even with discrepancies, automating 80%+ of matches that previously required manual review.

beforeAfter.before: Staff manually compare invoice lines against POs and goods receipts in separate screens, handling tolerance mismatches one by one.
beforeAfter.after: AI performs fuzzy matching across documents, auto-resolves tolerance variances within policy, and routes only true exceptions for review.

steps.title: Coding & GL Allocation
steps.description: Assign general ledger codes, cost centers, and department allocations

aiOpportunity.description: AI can learn from historical coding patterns to auto-suggest GL accounts, cost centers, and allocation splits with 85%+ accuracy.

painPoints: Inconsistent GL coding across team members
New vendors with no coding history

beforeAfter.before: AP staff manually look up GL accounts and cost centers, often guessing on unfamiliar categories. Miscodes discovered at month-end require correcting journal entries.
beforeAfter.after: AI suggests GL codes and allocations based on vendor history, invoice content, and organizational rules — reducing miscodes and month-end corrections.

aiOpportunity.description: AI can learn approval patterns and automatically route invoices to the right approvers, predict approval likelihood, and suggest optimal routing paths.

beforeAfter.before: Invoices sit in email-based approval chains for days. When an approver is out, no one knows where the invoice is or who should act.
beforeAfter.after: AI routes invoices to the right approver instantly, auto-escalates stalled items, and reroutes around unavailable approvers based on delegation rules.

steps.title: Exception Management

aiOpportunity.description: AI can categorize exceptions, suggest resolutions based on historical patterns, and even auto-resolve common exception types.

painPoints: High volume of exceptions requiring manual review
Delayed payments due to unresolved exceptions

beforeAfter.before: Exceptions pile up in queues. Staff research each one from scratch, often re-solving the same type of issue they resolved last week.
beforeAfter.after: AI categorizes exceptions, surfaces similar resolved cases, and auto-resolves routine discrepancies — freeing staff for complex negotiations.

steps.title: Fraud & Duplicate Detection
steps.description: Detect duplicate invoices, fraudulent submissions, and anomalous patterns

aiOpportunity.description: AI can analyze invoice patterns, vendor behavior, and payment history to detect duplicates and fraud with far greater accuracy than manual review.

painPoints: Duplicate invoices slipping through manual checks
Lack of pattern analysis across invoice history
Reactive rather than proactive fraud detection

beforeAfter.before: Duplicates are caught only if exact amounts match. Sophisticated fraud (altered bank details, phantom vendors) goes undetected until audit.
beforeAfter.after: AI scans every invoice against historical patterns, flags near-duplicates, detects anomalous vendor behavior, and prevents payment before fraud occurs.

impactMetrics.costImpact: 0.5-1% of AP spend saved from fraud

steps.title: Payment Scheduling & Optimization
steps.description: Schedule payments to optimize cash flow and capture discounts

aiOpportunity.description: AI can optimize payment timing to maximize early payment discounts while maintaining optimal cash flow, potentially saving 1-2% of AP spend.

beforeAfter.before: Payments are scheduled in weekly batches regardless of discount terms. Cash flow forecasting is done in spreadsheets, missing optimization windows.
beforeAfter.after: AI optimizes payment timing per vendor, captures early-pay discounts automatically, and balances cash flow across payment cycles.

steps.title: Payment Execution
steps.description: Execute payments via ACH, wire, check, or card

aiOpportunity.description: AI can recommend optimal payment methods based on cost, speed, and vendor preferences, and detect potential payment fraud.

beforeAfter.before: Staff manually select payment methods, print checks, and manage bank files. Vendor payment preferences are tracked in spreadsheets.
beforeAfter.after: AI recommends the cheapest payment rail per vendor, auto-generates payment files, and validates bank details against fraud databases.

steps.title: Reconciliation & Reporting
steps.description: Reconcile payments and generate compliance reports

aiOpportunity.description: AI can automate reconciliation by matching payments to invoices and GL entries, and generate natural language insights from AP data.

painPoints: Manual reconciliation of payments to GL
Limited visibility into AP metrics and KPIs

beforeAfter.before: Month-end close takes days of manual reconciliation. Reports are static exports requiring further manipulation before sharing with leadership.
beforeAfter.after: AI continuously reconciles payments against GL entries, auto-generates compliance reports, and surfaces natural-language insights on AP performance.
